name: Nice n' Quiet
description:
Player #1 controls: 

  • click LMB to move around
  • RMB to aim

Player #2 controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • E to steal/drop

Local co-op heist simulator made for this gamejam. Steal the diamonds and avoid getting caught. 

  • The more valueable the item, the longer it takes to steal.
  •  Each alarm cuts remaining time by 20 seconds.
  • Killing hostages is penalized.
  • Your bag can hold 6 items at a time.  No matter their value.

Good luck!
